title: Do I need that person's permission to use that person's name as a Champion name reference?
body: For example, if I were to introduce you the champion concept of Leafyishere, do I need his permission to even suggest his name in the champion concept? I am just going to use that person's name and nothing else.

replies.body:
YouTube channel names are intellectual property.

Leafyishere isn't his name, it's his brand, so yes you would need permission.

Or, something like that. Not a lawyer, just not dumb.

If you're just trying to post someone's else's concept
then that would be plagiarism bud
Just the name, not the whole concept.
Think they are asking about using player handles as potential champion names... and the example just sounds incredibly stupid.
